Subject: Hostage Situation
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Ramhorn/Hades/Anubis:



Unitron saw Hot Rod charge at Koga Shuko, and fire three blasts from his free 
laser rifle at him, and saw Spears coming at him, firing three optic blasts 
at her left knee.  "STAY WHERE YOU ARE!  OR THE MAXIMAL DOG DIES!  YOU WILL 
HEAR OUR DEMANDS!"

Hades and Anubis jumped back from laser fire yelling.

"HOLD YOUR FIRE!  HOLD YOUR FIRE!  WE HAVE A HOSTAGE!"

Koga Shuko looked around.  

"We will release this piece of slag as long as we have your words that we 
will not be attacked or taken prisoner by any Maximals or any of the 
Maximal's allies, and will not attack for the next five days."

Ramhorn's optics slowly opened, seeing different sights.  Three Maximals he'd 
never seen before, and Ramulus.  He tried to move, but was too weak to break 
out of Shuko's grip.

"What the slag!?  WHAT?!  YOU IDIOTS LET ME BECOME A HOSTAGE!  By the 
Pit...what a bunch of foul ups." he mumbled.  "I bet they got to the bridge, 
too, didn't they!?" Ramhorn sighed, waiting to see what the others did, but 
he saw Maximals opening fire at them and called them all 'bad' names almost 
inaudibly.
